    • Uses of ForthWord in Controllers

      Methods in Controllers with parameters of type ForthWord 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean GameController.sendMail(Robot sender, int receiverNumber, ForthWord value)
      Sends a forth word from one robot to the mailbox of another Robots must be on the same team, and the forth word must be either an int, a string, or a boolean Called by the forth interpreter

      boolean Robot.addMailFromMember(int sender, ForthWord newMail)
      Saves a new value into this robot's mailbox the mailbox has a capacity of 6 If the mailbox is full or the robot is destroyed, it will return false

      Constructor parameters in Models with type arguments of type ForthWord 
      Constructor and Description
      ForthConditional(java.util.Queue<ForthWord> stringList)
      parses through the input words, placing them into either command list Commands are placed in the true branch until it encounters an else word, then commands are placed in the false branch
